para.sentence: Abramowitz and Stegun (1964, Chapter 23) includes exact values of \sum_{k=1}^{m}k^{n} , m=1(1)100 , n=1(1)10 ; \sum_{k=1}^{\infty}k^{-n} , \sum_{k=1}^{\infty}(-1)^{k-1}k^{-n} , \sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(2k+1)^{-n} , n=1,2,\ldots , 20D; \sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}(2k+1)^{-n} , n=1,2,\ldots , 18D.
Wagstaff (1978) gives complete prime factorizations of N_{n} and E_{n} for n=20(2)60 and n=8(2)42 , respectively.
InWagstaff (2002) these results are extended to n=60(2)152 and n=40(2)88 , respectively, with further complete and partial factorizations listed up to n=300 and n=200 , respectively.
For information on tables published before 1961 seeFletcher et al. (1962, v. 1, §4) andLebedev and Fedorova (1960, Chapters 11 and 14).
